title: AI-Powered Meeting Summarization & Action Items
description: Transform meeting recordings and notes into actionable summaries with clear next steps
source: Based on prompt engineering techniques from Reddit r/PromptEngineering and Anthropic's Claude prompting guide

steps.title: Meeting Summary and Action Items
steps.description: Extract key decisions and create actionable task list
steps.toolReason: Best for analyzing complex meeting content and extracting structured insights
steps.prompt:
You are an experienced executive assistant. Think step by step through this meeting content.

Analyze this meeting and extract:
1. Key decisions made
2. Action items with owners and deadlines
3. Follow-up needed

Meeting content: [paste transcript/notes]
Meeting type: [standup/review/planning]
Date: [date]

Format as:
**Summary**: [2-3 sentence overview]
**Decisions**: [bullet list]
**Action Items**: [task - owner - deadline]
**Next Steps**: [follow-up meetings/check-ins]
tips: Include specific names and deadlines for action items
Ask for clarification if owners or deadlines are unclear
